alert.note: Alert for Southern Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 03 at 7:04PM CDT until October 05 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM WEDNESDAY TO 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Coastal Flood Advisory, minor coastal flooding. For the second Coastal Flood Advisory, minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Lower Lafourche, Coastal Jefferson Parish, Lower Plaquemines, Lower St. Bernard, Southeast St. Tammany and Eastern Orleans Parishes. In Mississippi, Southern Hancock County. * WHEN...For the first Coastal Flood Advisory, until 7 AM CDT Wednesday. For the second Coastal Flood Advisory, from 7 PM Wednesday to 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
